Articles.Content:
The Crew:

Model maker:--------------------------------------------manuelasa1999

CFG file maker and repairer:----------------------------kevinlacht

Texturer:-------------------------------------------------Sava

Making the habitats, landers and those things:--------SkyHook

Ares I, Ares V and the Orion Capsule:

CFG files: [100% done]

Models: [100% done]

Testing: [4% done]

Textures: [15% done]

Landers, habitats and those things:

CFG files: [0% done]

Models: [0% done]

Testing: [0% done]

Textures: [0% done]

Comments about my development or misspellings in my topic, please reply .

Edited October 17, 2012 by kevinlacht
Update

It\'s decoupler not deacoupler.

Ok, tnx. Changed.
looks promising, do you have any specific goals, aesthetics, etc..., to guide your development?

looks promising, do you have any specific goals, aesthetics, etc..., to guide your development?

Not really, I try to make every day about 3 CFG files. So my CFG development go\'s good right now, only with the textures I have some problems, but manuelasa1999 will helping me with that.

I\'m also thinking of make some deadlines for everything (only for me, not for manuelasa1999).
Nice, excited to see it finished, I hope you puto some thought into balence though. . .
On Ares 1\'s command pod, is there a higher polygon count version?

On Ares 1\'s command pod, is there a higher polygon count version?

I dont understand :

On Ares 1\'s command pod, is there a higher polygon count version?

Srry for the late reaction, I though I already answered the question.

Manuelasa1999 is working now on a higher polygon count version of it. If you look at manuelasa\'s developmentblog you can see he started the last days to make a higher polygon count version of the pod (also pics).

I'm proud to say this:

The CFG files are (basicly) done!

All the basic date are in the CFG files now, only the attachments and fixing some porblems so it can work in the game, and after that only the textures and we are ready for the release: 1.0!

We are still looking for a texturer.

Do you have interest, please contact me or manuelasa1999. You will also have 33% of the credits.
After you do this could you create a Mars Direct kinda deal? that would make this so cool.
Could you please post some WIP pictures if you can?

Sine 0.17 the finished parts are broken, but over a week I will have all the time to fix these, so at that time I will try to take some pictures. Also, whe have a new texturer, he will also make things like landers and those things.

I hope I have answered your questions.

More good news!

Sava will be the new texturer of Eagle Industries.

Congratulations Sava.
Nice then, glad to have another member!
